website_summaries.verdict: A rich mask that contains moisture-packed oils that tackle dry, brittle hair. Not the best pick to tame frizz or for fine or thin hair, however.
pros: In addition to argan oil, this mask contains coconut fatty acids and argan butter that leaves hair shiny and hydrated
Conditions in as little as five to 10 minutes per treatment, and you don't need to use a lot to get results
cons: Doesn't control frizz as well as it moisturizes
Can be a bit heavy on fine hair

customer_reviews.title: I have fine hair and love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after trying a sample from a spa. This one is the exact same (not fake). I have fine, thin hair that is color treated and people keep recommending light shampoo and conditioner for fine hair, but those cause my hair to be dry, fly-away, and it gets those super fine tangles that are impossible to get out without breaking my hair. I was worried this might be too heavy, but I use a little daily as a conditioner and it leaves my hair soft, smooth, shiny, and tangle free. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it's fake
customer_reviews.text: So I was a little paranoid after reading the review that this product was fake, I didn't see the review until after I had ordered. Because I was worried, I ordered another one directly from Moraccon oil. They look exactly the same and smell the same as well. Mine was sold from Gold Fulfillment, so maybe that's why?! I love the smooth mask, it has made a huge diff. Blow drys smoother, takes away the frizz and overall healthier. I use a small amount one a week ( focusing mostly on my ends ) and it normally last me about 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Okay. So. This is incredible. I have tried so many products, from conditioners,shampoos, treatments,serums,masks. This is what returned my hair to its youthful self. I always had silky hair, and then, out of the blue it became like cotton candy. It stopped moving in individual strands and would move as one unit, dry,brittle,and fried looking. I am happy to say, after first use, my hair is how it used to be, silky,shiny,strands fall independently.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Did Absolutely Nothing for Me
customer_reviews.text: I use other MoroccanOil products and love the scent, but this one is a complete loser for me. I have dry, often frizzy hair and this was supposed to help with that. However, I have now used it several times exactly as directed and notice not one single change in my hair. This is a pricey product and I didn't even get the usual lovely scent that I get with their other products. Nothing smoothing or effective about this product. I would never buy again nor recommend, particularly at this high price point. Surely there is something better out there.
customer_reviews.author: sjw

customer_reviews.title: What A Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant when I bought this, but when I did use it, it was well worth it! After my stylist washed my hair, she applied the smoothing mask as a deep conditioner. She sat me under a hair steamer for about 20 minutes. She then blow-dried my hair and continued with the silk press with a flat iron. Talking about a shine! Even she was amazed. And as usual, my hair smelled terrific. I plan to use the smoothing mask like a deep conditioner, after applying the restorative mask which is a protein. Will buy again! It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice. I noted that even after using this hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice. I noted that even after using this hair mask, my hair is still tangled. Usually after using a hair mask, my hair is silky and manageable. The same is true of their conditioner. It isn't cheap so I will not purchase this product line again.
customer_reviews.author: B2T2

customer_reviews.title: ... hair so in between my haircuts this really works nicely. Once a week would be ideal but if ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm growing out my hair so in between my haircuts this really works nicely. Once a week would be ideal but if I get it on my hair once a month, that works, too. I've also been trying out new hairstyling products and I've noticed that my hair needs more moisture so this works great for that, too.
customer_reviews.author: BFD Piper

customer_reviews.title: Hair super frizzy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take my frizzy hair. I don’t think it’s helping the frizz but my hair is definitely softer as I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love ALL Moroccan Oil products!! Haven't found a bad product yet.
customer_reviews.author: Big dog momma

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product from a blog review, it was one of their top products (I don't recall the blog). After using this product now three times (once a week). I do not like it. It made my hair Look and feel dull. I didn't notice any positive difference in the way my hair looked or feel after styling. I would skip over this product and look for another. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: MrsIke

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my wife...
customer_reviews.text: ...and she absolutely loves it! Her hair feels amazing even after washing it a couple of times after using the product!
customer_reviews.author: Son Goku

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but doesn’t moisturize very well
customer_reviews.text: Has a good scent. But isn’t very moisturizing for being a hair mask.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Not something I would pay so much money for again. There are cheaper conditioners you can mix with honey and olive oil to get the same effect. On the other hand, it makes my hair smell great.
customer_reviews.author: DMiller311

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this mask is the best. makes your hair silky and shiny instantly.
customer_reviews.author: sharkie

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately this did nothing for my thick curly/frizzy hair. ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did nothing for my thick curly/frizzy hair. I saw no difference and the smell is very strong, though not unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: mbruz

customer_reviews.title: Buy one that’s normal price to get legit product
customer_reviews.text: The product was watered down . It was not thick like it usually is from the actual company and did not work like the product from the actual company .
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it...it is much lighter than the Moroccan Restorative mask...which is also nice, but will be purchasing the smoothing mask going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Do Yoga

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The product really gets rid of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The product really gets rid of the frizz.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the product I wanted and it arrived when stated.
customer_reviews.author: Julie U

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hair mask, love this one!
customer_reviews.text: My hair loves this mask. It's kind of thick and I used it in the shower and left it on about 7 or 8 minutes. It smells amazing. My hair felt ok after getting out, but once I dried it it was so manageable, no frizz, and maybe 15% boost in overall shine. The shine was so noticeable it caught my eye the next morning. I usually straighten my hair, and after this product I only dried it and not even all the way. It feels and looks amazing, like when you can't stop playing with your hair it looks so good. It's pricey but this one is worth it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Felt more like just straight coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: I love hair masks, and I had high hopes for this Moroccan oil mask, but it just didn’t work for me. The consistency of the mask itself felt a little off to me, it felt more like just slathering coconut oil on my hair, which is fine, but it didn’t feel super rich which is what I look for in a mask. Generally for me the thicker the mask the better it moisturizes my hair, but this didn’t have that thick creamy consistency that I like. It did an okay job and moisturizing, but I probably wouldn’t buy this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Estevez

customer_reviews.title: their original hair masking product - the best
customer_reviews.text: This product was my very first experience with the Moroccanoil - and it continues to be the best conditioner/healing mask for me. they have not changed the product much over the years and have kept the high standard. if you color/blow dry your hair constantly then this is what you need to heal/condition your hair before your next hairdressing visit. Leaves a loverl fragrance to your hair - not plastic unlike other enriching conditioners.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely Yours

customer_reviews.title: Humidity can't be Tamed
customer_reviews.text: I have short curly hair and I live in a humid climate. That fact of life is something I've learned to live with. I've tried letting my hair get " longer", but it immediately turns to a frizz ball. I've tried other products which work just as well as this one...for less money. Perhaps things will be different in another month or so when dry weather comes back. Then I can assess if this product truly makes my hair more manageable . For now, August in SC is not frizz friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Fran46

customer_reviews.title: Not life changing.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is okay, I wouldn't say it's earth shattering hair care. I didn't quite follow the instructions (towel dry, let sit and then rinse) I don't have time for that. So I just let it sit while I finished my shower as I would with any hair mask. It's gives a decent amount of moisture but nothing I couldnt get from just about any hair mask.
customer_reviews.author: German Girl with a Spanish Name

customer_reviews.title: Almost There
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells amazing! I love hair masks and I use them at least once a week. The only thing that would make this better is it was in a tube packaging. I personally do not love jars as they are harder to use when in the shower. Otherwise, this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this worked as well as some other hair masks I've used. My hair didn't feel deeply conditioned. It conditioned it okay, just not deeply. Plus, I found out I'm allergic to the moroccanoil line of products, sadly. It caused scaly spots on my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏻 Made my hair feel dry and damaged
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this hair mask. I used it twice and both times this made my hair feel dry afterwards. The consistency is nice, easy to work with and the scent is also nice. And that’s the only good things I can say. This was a thumbs down for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on thin, curly hair
customer_reviews.text: My stylist recommended I use Moroccanoil products and this conditioner did not disappoint. Keeps my thin, curly hair from frizzing which is a problem for me. The scent was nice.
customer_reviews.author: T Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Like this product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. goes into hair nicely, rinses out well. Leave hair smooth with less tangles. Also smell is not too strong and is pleasing. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Sistertex

customer_reviews.title: Good mask.
customer_reviews.text: Very good conditioner, I keep it usually for 5 minutes only and it's enough for my fine bleached hair. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Bigslacker

product_meta.title: Moroccanoil Smoothing Hair Mask
product_meta.description:
Size:8.5 Fl Oz

 Unruly, frizzy hair becomes soft, smooth and easier to manage with the Moroccanoil Smoothing Mask. Enriched with coconut-derived fatty acids, argan butter and argan oil to deeply hydrate and intensely nourish hair, this highly concentrated mask improves elasticity while providing long-lasting conditioning benefits. Fragranced with the signature Moroccanoil scent, an exotic blend of spicy amber aromas and sweet floral notes. 



BRAND STORY
A story of success, an impulse for innovation and a relentless pursuit of high-performing oil-infused beauty products fashioned an iconic brand: Moroccanoil.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
